summary:
Senior professional with extensive experience in o.a. Project Management, Agile & Scrum, Business Process Management, Risk Management, Internal Control, Operational Auditing, Quality Management and Compliancy. Several significant and complex Change & Transformation projects implemented within different multinationals (Banking, Electronics and Retail Fashion & Food).

The projects were (most of the time) Global programmes driven and Technology or Finance driven, focussing on supporting Senior Management in implementing new business processes, applications, infrastructure, organisation structures, Control Frameworks (a.o. ERM or AO/IC). 

I am passionate about creating and implementing an "Excellence" awareness and framework by bringing People, Businesses, Processes, Systems and Energy together in a structural and practical way: thus Business AND Energy Process Management. 

My Key Drivers are: Change, Innovation and Business & Energy Excellence: 
"Balance and excell in life!"
"Be in spirit and inspire wherever you are!"

Specialties: 
- Project Management: certified
- Scrum Master: certified
- Operational Auditing
- Business Process Management
- Risk Management, ERM, IRM 
- AO/ IC
- Compliancy (e.g. SOx, COSO, CobIt, Wft, Wwft, FATF) & Corporate Governance
- Quality Management (ISO, EFQM, INK model, KAIZEN)
- Change Management
- Treasury
- Outsourcing
- Process modelling (ARIS, BWise)
- Training (local & world wide) 
- Management Coaching - Leadership Qualities-Belbin
- Energy Process Management Coaching- Chakra System

company.name: Change To Excellence: Consultancy, Interim & Coaching services

profile_positions.company: Change To Excellence: Consultancy, Interim & Coaching services
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
Global Data Platform (GDP: former Enterprise Data Lake):
A. Product Owner squad Hypnos. Focus: metadata API, Plausibility API, Data Quality Monitoring. Retention functionality (HISDA), Data Governance. Main key activities:
1. Roadmap development, alignment, execution and weekly status reporting.
2. Timely deliver PBI’s & execute all Agile processes. 3. Delivery of Data Quality Dashboard & Data Quality Engine.
4. Delivery of HISDA: retention functionality on the Global Data Platform.
5. Application Collibra alignment regarding impact metadata.
6. GDP Data Governance: assure compliance to Rabobank & GDP Governance.

B. Product Owner Data controls for “Know Your Customer” (KYC/ FEC) processes & participate as a PO in the Taskforce “Optimize metadata Collibra”.
Main key activities:
1. Assess the GDP processes & activities to map the needed data controls.
2. Create/ optimize data controls, in case of non-availability or non- Rabobank
compliant data controls.
3. KYC Dashboard creation: centralizing local KYC control activities within GDP in
to one GDP Dashboard.
4. Implementing KYC controls and supporting the transformation to “data as a
product” (scope: KYC critical data sources on GDP & the remainder including
Wholesale & HR).
7. Close alignment and cooperation with Data Set Owners, Data Science,
Consumers, internal GDP squads, DM Office and with Rabobank Audit.
8. Create a clear way of working of data controls execution and optimization of
onboarding process with clear data control way of working.
9. Executing walkthroughs/ training of all Data Governance to all producers.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for implementing the migration of all relevant Credit processes to the new centralized platform of Rabobank: Oxygen. Supporting the Rabobank CFO Strategy (rock solid bank) and the NFRA Programme (transformation from report to data driven Reporting chain). Main key activities: Project Management & Business Change Mgt:
1. Set up kick off meeting and regular monitor meetings with all relevant stakeholders: create awareness about the project objectives, the timelines & the way of working ensuring timely delivery of the project.
2. Close cooperation with the Product Owner and Agile team members to timely deliver the PBI’s and execute all Agile processes timely.
3. Frequent dashboard reporting to the Delivery Manager and Operational Triangle on progress of the PBI’s and the project plan execution. Escalate on impediments that need Mgt intervention.
4. Cross departmental process improvements:
a. Improve the change management processes.
b. Improve the cooperation between the Agile teams Credit Track and
other (external) Agile teams.
Tasks:
- Deliver Project Mgt products: Kick off presentation based on BRD, Dashboard reporting based on PBI progress and Project plan, Dependency Management, Product Breakdown Structure (PBS), Risk log, Issue log, Quality Register, Test plan, Implementation plan.
- Complex stakeholder mgt due to many stakeholders involved.
- Regular Reporting to several Boards/ Triangles.
- PMO activities: monitoring and resolution of issues, risks, reporting, resources. - Execute interviews with new project team members.
1. Create transparency and consensus about complex requirements between
several stakeholders involved, resulting in adequate delivery of PBI’s.
2. Eliminate significant sub optimizations in the full value chain and accelerate
the decision making process.
3. Due to COVID19 and working from home still being able to motivate all Agile
team members to deliver as planned.
4. Rabobank made compliant for external law and regulations.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager, Utrecht

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Project Management  (Scrum methodology)
1. Project Bravo: migration done of Rabobanks accounting system Atlas: CNA, COK and ART to the new Rabobank International and Rabobank Netherlands domains.
- Stakeholders management over the full architectural chain
- Project board member: report and escalate to Management/ Board timely where needed.
- Project planning & resource mgt: leading the RI and RN teams to deliver timely and adequately.
- Create and monitor the financial business case, budget plan, risk log, issue log, High level report.
- Runbook creation, managing & executing of the run book with all stakeholders

2. Project IFRS9: implement IFRS9 standards functional and technical wise to deliver complete external reporting per april 2018 over Quarter1 2018.
- Stakeholders management
- Project planning
- BCM and Cluster reporting: report and escalate to Management timely where needed.
- Runbook managing
profile_positions.title: Project Manager & Business Change Manager- IT & Strategy

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for managing several projects within IT Services EUS:
1. Rightfax: implementation of new environment for managed printing services
2. Control Work: Implementation of RSI prevention application
3. Roadmap 2015: assessment on project initiatives ITS EUS for 2015 and preparation of mandates with IBM as strategic partner
4. LIP Asia: implementation of Lotus Notes for Asia.
5. C-Major Project Management: managing the customer dependencies of several projects (e.g. Software Pull, Low Touch Provisioning, CSL's, Chat & Selfhelp portal- including role of My IT) based on the C-Major contract IBM- ABN AMRO.
6. VPN & Kiosk Project Management & monitor on PrinceII quality standards.
7. Presenter on town hall event regarding CMajor ITS EUS.
8. Telephony Transformation: Project Management --> realising significant cost savings (MIO) for ABN AMRO by realising KPN EEN/ One CUG/ Integration of Fixed and Mobile Telephony to one integrated platform and removal of ISDN2/ Analogue and fax lines.

Main responsibilities:
- Report to Executive, Project Board, Streamboard, Portfolio Manager, Head of ITS EUS and ITDC.
- Setup, prepare, lead and register the Project Board meetings and team meetings.
- Align with external parties e.g. IBM, KPN, Verizon regarding products and planning, focussing on deliver on commitments made
- Create and monitor the mandate, PID, projectplan (PBS driven), financial business case, budget plan, risk log, issue log, High level report, exception report, end project report, issue slides CCB, testplan, implementation plan, evidence log (for the assurance role monitor external supplier on delivering these PM products based on AAB PrinceII quality standards as agreed to in the contract).
- Setup contract CSL's/ CSAT's.
- Initiating CRA & ADD intakes and alignment with Legal, Compliance, ORM, OR and CISO where needed to mitigate projects risks in an adequate manner.
- Escalate to Management/ Steerco timely where needed.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Project Management & Agile/ Scrum 2 projects:
1.	Project Excellent Production: Optimizing Development & Operations processess (ITIL) concerning 57 critical applications. eliminating outages in production environment and preparing for DevOps & I&O Agile organization. Regression testing, Release Management, Transition Management, Change Management, Write access to production en Global Asset Management (CI Management). Tasks: Project Management (Lean Project Charter etc.), budget control, setup of Agile & Scrum way of working, assessment of current risks (workshops), improvement plan, delivering support concerning setup and monitoring of epics, user stories, backlog, sprints, daily stand ups, impediments and demo’s. Progress reporting in Rally tool and reporting to Management. 
2.	Project Mergers & acquisitions IT risk investigation: investigation of Mergers en acquisities done in recent 10 years, infrastructure and applications. Project Management (Lean Project Charter etc.), budget control, kick off project, progress reporting to Management.
profile_positions.title: Independent professional: Freelance Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for extending the StoreForce application with T&A functionality for the Netherlands, Germany, Belgium and France. Including roll out of hard clocks= T&A with fingerprint scanning.

* Create the projectplan and manage the project and project teams
* Requirements analysis
* Investigation of country law and regulations and impact on T&A and use of hard clocks (a.o. works council)
* Alignment requirements with developer and Mexx stakeholders
* UAT
* Management reporting
* Create instructions and training material
* Train Retail Operations, HR, Control
* Admin role for Storeforce application
* Solve reported issues or follow up with developer
